name: TwoDimensionalScrollView
desc: A widget that combines a [TwoDimensionalScrollable] and a [TwoDimensionalViewport] to create an interactive scrolling pane of content in both vertical and horizontal dimensions.

fields.name: delegate
fields.desc: A delegate that provides the children for the [TwoDimensionalScrollView].

fields.name: diagonalDragBehavior
fields.desc: Whether scrolling gestures should lock to one axes, allow free movement in both axes, or be evaluated on a weighted scale.

fields.name: mainAxis
fields.desc: The main axis of the two.

fields.name: verticalDetails
fields.desc: The configuration of the vertical Scrollable.

fields.name: horizontalDetails
fields.desc: The configuration of the horizontal Scrollable.
